solution_line_template: After driving to the store and doctor's office, Winston has {initial_gas} - {gas_to_store} - {gas_to_doctor} = <<{initial_gas}-{gas_to_store}-{gas_to_doctor}={gas_left}>>{gas_left} gallons of gas left in the tank
To refill the entire tank, Winston needs {tank_capacity} - {gas_left} = <<{tank_capacity}-{gas_left}={gas_needed_to_refill}>>{gas_needed_to_refill} gallons of gas
